name: Zombie Invasion Playground
description:
Its my first Vr game and it take a lot of efforts.

Its a playground with zombie, you Need to use axe or ball to kill the zombies.

there a kill counter too you can score more and tell me about your score mine is 35.

I Hope You like it 

TELL ME IF YOU LIKE IT AND I WILL ADD SOME MORE WEAPONS LIKE GUNS, LIGHTSABER,  AND MORE DIFFERENT ZOMBIES...
